title: Thresh meele or ranged
body: So was playing thresh in a bots game for fun decided to try to build huricane, but that wasnt allowed  cause thresh is melee so i bought hydra but i couldn't uuse active cause im ranged, and my suport item also wouldnt excute cause im ranged.

replies.body:
Hey AxeRaider,

Thresh's auto attacks are ranged, but his animation is melee. Runaans should've worked on Thresh.
